purpose: Comprehensive documentation for new developers joining the RadiantCompass team focusing on autonomous AI tool system

executive_summary.mission: Transform every rare-disease diagnosis into a guided path of clarity, compassion, and choice through AI-powered autonomous tool activation
executive_summary.market_context: 400K+ U.S. patients receive rare-disease diagnosis annually, $12B global rare-disease market
executive_summary.current_status: 5% complete - 4 of 80+ tools implemented with sophisticated orchestration framework
executive_summary.key_innovation: Dr. Maya (Claude 3.7) autonomously detects patient needs and activates relevant healthcare tools within chat interface

autonomous_tool_system.overview: Dr. Maya AI Copilot analyzes patient conversations in real-time, detects trigger words/phrases, and autonomously activates appropriate healthcare tools with pre-populated data

step_1.name: Conversation Analysis
step_1.description: Dr. Maya (Claude 3.7 Sonnet) analyzes every patient message for medical context, emotional state, and tool triggers
step_1.technical_implementation: Real-time NLP processing with 85%+ confidence scoring

step_2.name: Trigger Detection
step_2.description: System matches conversation content against comprehensive trigger word registry for each tool
step_2.technical_implementation: Backend registry at /backend/app/routes/journey.py with stage-specific tool manifests

step_3.name: Tool Orchestration
step_3.description: toolOrchestrator.ts determines most relevant tool and sends activation command to frontend
step_3.technical_implementation: CopilotKit runtime processes tool selection and returns UI component to display

step_4.name: Visual Tool Activation
step_4.description: Appropriate tool component slides into chat interface with smooth animations
step_4.technical_implementation: React components in /frontend/src/components/tools/ with slideIn 0.3s ease-out animations

step_5.name: Autonomous Data Population
step_5.description: Dr. Maya pre-fills tool forms with data extracted from conversation context
step_5.technical_implementation: autoFillData props passed to tool components via useEffect hooks

step_6.name: Patient Collaboration
step_6.description: Patient can edit pre-filled data or let Dr. Maya complete autonomously
step_6.technical_implementation: Real-time onDataUpdate callbacks sync patient edits with AI context

example_interaction.patient_says: I've been having this weird chest pain that comes and goes
example_interaction.dr_maya_response: I hear you're experiencing chest pain - that must be concerning. Let me start tracking this symptom for you so we can understand the pattern better.
example_interaction.autonomous_action: SymptomTracker tool slides into chat interface pre-filled with 'chest pain', severity slider, frequency options
example_interaction.patient_experience: Patient sees professional medical form with their symptom already populated, can edit details or proceed

frontend.styling: TailwindCSS 4.1 with custom medical design system
key_files: SymptomTracker.tsx - Fully implemented symptom tracking with auto-fill
ConditionExplainer.tsx - Medical condition education with AI explanations

ai_runtime.tools: tools/ directory with awarenessTools.ts and journeyTools.ts

symptom_tracker.description: Beautiful blue-themed interface for tracking symptoms with severity slider, frequency, duration, notes
symptom_tracker.auto_fill_capabilities: Symptom name, severity level, frequency selection from conversation context
symptom_tracker.technical_notes: Complete React component with real-time data sync and Apple-inspired design

condition_explainer.description: Green-themed educational interface explaining medical conditions with symptoms, causes, next steps
condition_explainer.auto_fill_capabilities: Condition name, description, symptoms list, causes, warning signs
condition_explainer.technical_notes: Comprehensive React component with loading states and medical disclaimers

year_1_goals.ai_agents_implemented: Provider Prophet and Anxiety Alchemist systems
year_1_goals.healthcare_integration: FHIR R4 compliance and EHR connectivity

year_2_goals.stages_4_9_complete: Full treatment journey support through active therapy

tool_development_pattern.step_1: Backend trigger registration in journey.py manifest
tool_development_pattern.step_3: Auto-fill data integration with conversation context
tool_development_pattern.step_6: Testing with Dr. Maya conversation triggers

frontend.component_structure: Props interface, state management, auto-fill hooks, real-time sync

backend.data_validation: Pydantic models with medical field validation

ai_runtime.orchestration: CopilotKit runtime with tool selection logic

healthcare_compliance.hipaa_requirements: All tools must handle PHI with encryption and audit logging
healthcare_compliance.medical_accuracy: Clinical review required for all medical content and tools
healthcare_compliance.data_retention: Patient data retention policies and deletion workflows
healthcare_compliance.security_standards: OAuth 2.0, MFA, end-to-end encryption for medical data

conversation_testing.trigger_validation: Test all trigger words activate correct tools
conversation_testing.context_preservation: Ensure conversation context carries through tool activation
conversation_testing.auto_fill_accuracy: Verify AI extracts correct data for tool pre-population

integration_testing.end_to_end_flows: Complete patient journey through multiple tool activations
integration_testing.ai_orchestration: Dr. Maya tool selection accuracy and relevance
integration_testing.healthcare_workflows: Medical professional review of tool outputs

performance_testing.response_times: Tool activation < 3 seconds, AI responses < 5 seconds
performance_testing.data_accuracy: 99%+ accuracy for medical data extraction and tool pre-filling

required_roles.clinical_advisor: Medical professional for content review, 1 needed

technical_metrics.tool_completion_rate: Target: 80+ tools implemented by end of Year 1
technical_metrics.autonomous_activation_accuracy: Target: 95%+ correct tool selection by Dr. Maya
technical_metrics.patient_engagement: Target: 80%+ of patients use 3+ tools per session
technical_metrics.response_time: Target: <3 seconds for tool activation, <5 seconds for AI responses

clinical_metrics.patient_satisfaction: Target: 4.5+ stars for tool usefulness and accuracy
clinical_metrics.care_coordination: Target: 50%+ reduction in appointment preparation time
clinical_metrics.health_outcomes: Target: Improved medication adherence and follow-up compliance
clinical_metrics.provider_efficiency: Target: 30%+ time savings in patient information gathering

key_apis: Claude 3.7 Sonnet API - Primary AI model for healthcare conversations
CopilotKit Runtime - Tool orchestration and AI integration
CMS Hospital Compare - Treatment center data and outcomes
ClinicalTrials.gov - Research study matching and information
learning_resources: FastAPI Healthcare Patterns - Async/await with medical data
React 19 Medical UI Components - Accessibility and healthcare design
HIPAA Compliance for Developers - Healthcare data security requirements
